verses.verse: "You shall make <S%H6213><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> of acacia <S%H7848><s%> wood, <S%H6086><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> long, <S%H753><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> broad; <S%H7341><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> shall be foursquare: <S%H7251><s%> and its height <S%H6967><s%> shall be three <S%H7969><s%> cubits. <S%H520><s%>

You shall make <S%H6213><s%> its horns <S%H7161><s%> on its four <S%H702><s%> corners; <S%H6438><s%> its horns <S%H7161><s%> shall be of one piece with it; <S%H6823><s%> and you shall overlay it with brass. <S%H5178><s%>

You shall make <S%H6213><s%> its pots <S%H5518><s%> to take away its ashes, <S%H1878><s%> its shovels, <S%H3257><s%> its basins, <S%H4219><s%> its flesh hooks, <S%H4207><s%> and its fire pans: <S%H4289><s%> all its vessels <S%H3627><s%> you shall make <S%H6213><s%> of brass. <S%H5178><s%>

You shall make <S%H6213><s%> a grating <S%H4345><s%> for it of network <S%H4639><s%> of brass: <S%H5178><s%> and on the net <S%H7568><s%> you shall make <S%H6213><s%> four <S%H702><s%> bronze <S%H5178><s%> rings <S%H2885><s%> in its four <S%H702><s%> corners. <S%H7098><s%>

You shall put <S%H5414><s%> it under the ledge <S%H3749><s%> around the altar <S%H4196><s%> beneath, <S%H4295><s%> that the net <S%H7568><s%> may reach <S%H5704><s%> halfway <S%H2677><s%> up the altar. <S%H4196><s%>
You shall make <S%H6213><s%> poles <S%H905><s%> for the altar, <S%H4196><s%> poles <S%H905><s%> of acacia <S%H7848><s%> wood, <S%H6086><s%> and overlay <S%H6823><s%> them with brass. <S%H5178><s%>

Its poles <S%H905><s%> shall be put <S%H935><s%> into the rings, <S%H2885><s%> and the poles <S%H905><s%> shall be on the two <S%H8147><s%> sides <S%H6763><s%> of the altar, <S%H4196><s%> when carrying it. <S%H5375><s%>
You shall make <S%H6213><s%> it with hollow <S%H5014><s%> planks. <S%H3871><s%> They shall make <S%H6213><s%> it as it has been shown <S%H7200><s%> you on the mountain. <S%H2022><s%>

"You shall make <S%H6213><s%> the court <S%H2691><s%> of the tabernacle: <S%H4908><s%> for the south <S%H5045><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> southward <S%H8486><s%> there shall be hangings <S%H7050><s%> for the court <S%H2691><s%> of fine twined <S%H7806><s%> linen <S%H8336><s%> one hundred <S%H3967><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> long <S%H753><s%> for one <S%H259><s%> side: <S%H6285><s%>

and its pillars <S%H5982><s%> shall be twenty, <S%H6242><s%> and their sockets <S%H134><s%> twenty, <S%H6242><s%> of brass; <S%H5178><s%> the hooks <S%H2053><s%> of the pillars <S%H5982><s%> and their fillets <S%H2838><s%> shall be of silver. <S%H3701><s%>

Likewise for the north <S%H6828><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> in length <S%H753><s%> there shall be hangings <S%H7050><s%> one hundred <S%H3967><s%> cubits long, <S%H753><s%> and its pillars <S%H5982><s%> twenty, <S%H6242><s%> and their sockets <S%H134><s%> twenty, <S%H6242><s%> of brass; <S%H5178><s%> the hooks <S%H2053><s%> of the pillars, <S%H5982><s%> and their fillets, <S%H2838><s%> of silver. <S%H3701><s%>

For the breadth <S%H7341><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%> on the west <S%H3220><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> shall be hangings <S%H7050><s%> of fifty <S%H2572><s%> cubits; <S%H520><s%> their pillars <S%H5982><s%> ten, <S%H6235><s%> and their sockets <S%H134><s%> ten. <S%H6235><s%>
The breadth <S%H7341><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%> on the east <S%H6924><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> eastward <S%H4217><s%> shall be fifty <S%H2572><s%> cubits. <S%H520><s%>

The hangings <S%H7050><s%> for the one side <S%H3802><s%> of the gate shall be fifteen <S%H2568><s%> cubits; <S%H520><s%> their pillars <S%H5982><s%> three, <S%H7969><s%> and their sockets <S%H134><s%> three. <S%H7969><s%>

For the other <S%H8145><s%> side <S%H3802><s%> shall be hangings <S%H7050><s%> of fifteen <S%H2568><s%> cubits; <S%H5982><s%> their pillars three, <S%H7969><s%> and their sockets <S%H134><s%> three. <S%H7969><s%>

For the gate <S%H8179><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%> shall be a screen <S%H4539><s%> of twenty <S%H6242><s%> cubits, <S%H520><s%> of blue, <S%H8504><s%> and purple, <S%H713><s%> and scarlet, <S%H8144><s%> and fine twined <S%H7806><s%> linen, <S%H8336><s%> the work of the embroiderer; <S%H7551><s%> their pillars <S%H5982><s%> four, <S%H702><s%> and their sockets <S%H134><s%> four. <S%H702><s%>

All the pillars <S%H5982><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> shall be filleted <S%H2836><s%> with silver; <S%H3701><s%> their hooks <S%H2053><s%> of silver, <S%H3701><s%> and their sockets <S%H134><s%> of brass. <S%H5178><s%>

The length <S%H753><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%> shall be one hundred <S%H3967><s%> cubits, <S%H520><s%> and the breadth <S%H7341><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> every where, <S%H2572><s%> and the height <S%H6967><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> cubits, <S%H520><s%> of fine twined <S%H7806><s%> linen, <S%H8336><s%> and their sockets <S%H134><s%> of brass. <S%H5178><s%>

All the instruments <S%H3627><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> in all its service, <S%H5656><s%> and all its pins, <S%H3489><s%> and all the pins <S%H3489><s%> of the court, <S%H2691><s%> shall be of brass. <S%H5178><s%>

"You shall command <S%H6680><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> that they bring <S%H3947><s%> to you pure <S%H2134><s%> olive <S%H2132><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> beaten <S%H3795><s%> for the light, <S%H3974><s%> to cause a lamp <S%H5216><s%> to burn <S%H5927><s%> continually. <S%H8548><s%>

In the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting, <S%H4150><s%> outside <S%H2351><s%> the veil <S%H6532><s%> which is before the testimony, <S%H5715><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> shall keep it in order <S%H6186><s%> from evening <S%H6153><s%> to morning <S%H1242><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh: <S%H3068><s%> it shall be a statute <S%H2708><s%> forever <S%H5769><s%> throughout their generations <S%H1755><s%> on the behalf of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
